atk-s0402a44:2_2: Pañcame ‘‘nīce kule paccājāto’’tiādikena tamena yuttoti tamo.
atk-s0402a44:2_5: ‘‘Aḍḍhe kule paccājāto’’tiādikena jotinā yuttato joti, ālokabhūtoti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0402a44:3_13: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhaveti ettha eko puggalo bahiddhā ālokaṁ adisvā mātu kucchimhiyeva kālaṁ katvā apāyesu nibbattanto sakalampi kappaṁ saṁsarati.
atk-s0402a44:3_16: Kuhakassa hi evarūpā nipphatti hotīti vuttaṁ.
atk-s0402a44:4_0: Ettha ca ‘‘nīce kule’’tiādīhi āgamanavipatti ceva paccuppannapaccayavipatti ca dassitā.
atk-s0402a44:4_1: ‘‘Dalidde’’tiādīhi pavattapaccayavipatti, ‘‘kasiravuttike’’tiādīhi ājīvupāyavipatti, ‘‘dubbaṇṇo’’tiādīhi attabhāvavipatti, ‘‘bahvābādho’’tiādīhi dukkhakāraṇasamāyogo, ‘‘na lābhī’’tiādīhi sukhakāraṇavipatti ceva upabhogavipatti ca, ‘‘kāyena duccarita’’ntiādīhi tamaparāyaṇabhāvassa kāraṇasamāyogo, ‘‘kāyassa bhedā’’tiādīhi samparāyikatamūpagamo.
atk-s0402a44:6_1: Chaṭṭhe oṇatoṇatoti idāni nīcako āyatimpi nīcako bhavissati.
atk-s0402a44:6_2: Oṇatuṇṇatoti idāni nīco āyatiṁ ucco bhavissati.
atk-s0402a44:6_3: Uṇṇatoṇatoti idāni ucco āyatiṁ nīco bhavissati.
atk-s0402a44:6_4: Uṇṇatuṇṇatoti idāni ucco āyatimpi ucco bhavissati.
atk-s0402a44:8_1: Sattame samaṇamacaloti samaṇaacalo, makāro padasandhikaro, niccalasamaṇoti attho.
atk-s0402a44:8_3: So hi sāsane mūlajātāya saddhāya patiṭṭhitattā acalo nāma.
atk-s0402a44:8_7: So hi jhānābhiññānaṁ abhāvena aparipuṇṇaguṇattā samaṇapuṇḍarīko nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a44:8_11: So hi jhānābhiññānaṁ bhāvena paripuṇṇaguṇattā samaṇapadumo nāma hoti .
atk-s0402a44:8_12: Samaṇesu samaṇasukhumāloti sabbesupi etesu samaṇesu sukhumālasamaṇo muducittasarīro kāyikacetasikadukkharahito ekantasukhī.
atk-s0402a44:9_0: Evaṁ mātikaṁ nikkhipitvā idāni paṭipāṭiyā vibhajanto kathañca, bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0402a44:9_3: Anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ patthayamāno viharatīti arahattaṁ patthayanto viharati.
atk-s0402a44:9_7: Macalappattoti rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa puttabhāvena ceva puttesu jeṭṭhakabhāvena ca na tāva abhisittabhāvena ca abhisekappattiatthāya acalappatto niccalapatto.
atk-s0402a44:10_0: Yācitova bahulaṁ cīvaraṁ paribhuñjatīti ‘‘idaṁ, bhante, paribhuñjathā’’ti evaṁ dāyakehi yācamāneheva upanītaṁ cīvaraṁ bahuṁ paribhuñjati, kiñcideva ayācitaṁ, bākulatthero viya.
atk-s0402a44:10_14: Kammavipākajānīti vināpi imehi kāraṇehi kevalaṁ pubbe katakammavipākavaseneva jātāni.
atk-s0402a44:10_15: Catunnaṁ jhānānanti ettha khīṇāsavānampi buddhānampi kiriyajjhānāneva adhippetāni.
atk-s0402a44:12_1: Aṭṭhame sāsane laddhappatiṭṭhattā sotāpannova samaṇamacaloti vutto, nātibahuguṇattā na bahupattaṁ viya saroruhaṁ sakadāgāmī samaṇapuṇḍarīkoti, tato bahutaraguṇattā satapattaṁ viya saroruhaṁ anāgāmī samaṇapadumoti, thaddhabhāvakarānaṁ kilesānaṁ sabbaso samucchinnattā mudubhāvappatto khīṇāsavo samaṇasukhumāloti.
atk-s0402a44:14_1: Navame sammādiṭṭhikotiādīhi aṭṭhaṅgikamaggavasena paṭhamasutte viya satta sekhā gahitā.
atk-s0402a44:14_2: Dutiyavāre dasaṅgikamaggavasena vā arahattaphalañāṇaarahattaphalavimuttīhi saddhiṁ, aṭṭhaṅgikamaggavasena vā sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavo kathito, tatiyavāre ubhatobhāgavimutto, catutthavāre tathāgato ca tathāgatasadisakhīṇāsavo cāti.
atk-s0402a44:14_3: Iti idaṁ suttaṁ paṭhamasutte kathitapuggalānaṁ vaseneva kathitaṁ, desanāmattameva panettha nānanti.
atk-s0402a44:16_1: Dasame paṭhamavāre arahattatthāya payogaṁ anārabhitvā ṭhito pamādavihārī sekhapuggalo kathito.
atk-s0402a44:16_2: Dutiyavāre anuppāditajjhāno āraddhavipassako appamādavihārī sekhapuggalo kathito.
atk-s0402a44:16_3: Tatiyavāre āraddhavipassako appamādavihārī aṭṭhavimokkhalābhī sekhapuggalo kathito, catutthavāre paramasukhumālakhīṇāsavoti.
